definition[0]: to move towards someone in a threatening way
example[0]: Suddenly, he came at me with a knife.
definition[1]: if images, questions, facts etc come at you, you feel confused because there are too many of them at the same time
example[1]: Questions were coming at me from all directions.
definition[2]: to consider or deal with a problem in a particular way
example[2]: We need to come at the problem from a different angle.
